S06dsp1-2_u:1_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham anekair bhikṣusahasraiḥ,
S06dsp1-2_u:1_1: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptair,
S06dsp1-2_u:1_2: ekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yadutāyuṣmantam ānandaṃ śaikṣaṃ srotaāpannaṃ;
S06dsp1-2_u:1_5: sarvair dṛṣṭasatyair; anekasahasraiś ca bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:1_6: sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir animittagocarair avikalpitapraṇidhānaiḥ samatākṣāntipratilabdhair asaṃgapratibhāṇapratilabdhaiḥ sarvaiś ca pañcābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair apagatajñānārthalābhasatkāracittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāragatair vaiśāradyaprāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ sarvakaraṇāvaraṇavimuktair dharmanirdeśasaṃcitair asaṃkhyeyakalpasamārabdhapraṇidhānaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvābhilāpibhir vyapagatabhrūkuṭīmukhair anantapariṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair anekakalpakoṭinirdeśaniḥsaraṇakuśalair māyāmarīcisvapnodakacandrapratibhāsākāśagandharvanagarapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktair apramāṇavaiśāradyasamanvāgataiḥ sarvasattvacittagatyadhimuktiparyāptikuśalaiḥ sarvasattvāpratihatacittair mahākṣāntisamanvāgatair yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalair anantabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigṛhītair asaṃkhyeyalokadhātugatabuddhānusmṛtisamādhisatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair nānādṛṣṭisamutthitakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhivikrīḍanaśatasahasranirhārakuśalais,
S06dsp1-2_u:1_8: ratnākareṇa ca, sārthavāhena ca, naradattena ca, varuṇadattena ca, indradattena ca, udāramatinā ca, viśeṣamatinā ca, vardhamānamatinā ca, amoghadarśinā ca, susaṃprasthitena cam, suvikrāntavikramiṇā ca, nityodyuktena ca, anikṣiptadhureṇa ca, ādityagarbheṇa ca, candragarbheṇa ca, anupamamatinā ca, avalokiteśvareṇa ca, mañjuśriyā ca, ratnamudrāhastena ca, nityotkṣiptahastena ca bodhisattvena,
S06dsp1-2_u:2_0: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śakraṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ ca sarvāṃś ca lokapālān tejasābhibhūya tāsāṃ catasṛnāṃ parṣadāṃ purato virocamāna ṛddhyā nānāvidhaṃ vikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayati sma.
S06dsp1-2_u:3_0: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāradvatīputras tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:3_1: sa tathāgatasyedṛśam ṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:3_2: sacen me bhagavān praśnavyākaraṇāyāvakāśaṃ kuryād ahaṃ bhagavantam kaṃcit pradeśaṃ prakṣyāmi.
S06dsp1-2_u:4_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:4_1: tathāgataṃ praṣṭuṃ, śāradvatīputra, sadā kṛtāvakāśatvād yat kiṃcit tvaṃ tathāgataṃ praṣṭum icchasi,
S06dsp1-2_u:4_2: tat prccha, praśnaprativacanena cāhaṃ tava cittam ārādhayiṣye.
S06dsp1-2_u:5_0: evam ukta āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:5_1: prajñāpāramitā, bhadanta bhagavan, prajñāpāramitety ucyate; katamā bhadanta bhagavan sā bodhisattvānaṃ prajñāpāramitā? kasya dharmasya pāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante?
S06dsp1-2_u:6_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmate śāradvatīputrāya sādhukāram adāt:
S06dsp1-2_u:6_1: sādhu, sādhu, śāradvatīputra, yat tvaṃ tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhānād evaṃ praśnaṃ pṛcchasi,
S06dsp1-2_u:6_2: sādhu; sundaras te saṃkalpaḥ, tena hi tvaṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06dsp1-2_u:7_0: evam astu bhadanta bhagavann ity āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
S06dsp1-2_u:8_0: bhagavāṃs tasyaitad avocat: śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitety ucyate yad idaṃ sarvadharmānabhiniveśaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:8_1: anabhiniviṣṭāḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06dsp1-2_u:9_0: āha: katame bhadanta bhagavaṃs te sarvadharmā yeṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anabhiniviṣṭāḥ?
S06dsp1-2_u:10_0: bhagavān āha: sarvadharmāḥ śāradvatīputrocyante yaduta pañca skandhā,
S06dsp1-2_u:10_1: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvāry āryasatyāni, dvādaśa pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:10_2: catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri samyakprahāṇāṇi, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, śūnyatāvimokṣamukham, animittavimokṣamukham, apraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramānāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo, 'sṭau vimokṣā, daśānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo,
S06dsp1-2_u:10_3: nava saṃjñā, daśānusmṛtayaḥ, ṣaṭ saṃjñākārā, dharmajñānam, anvayajñānaṃ, paracittajñānani, saṃvṛtijñānaṃ, duḥkhajñānaṃ, samudayajñānaṃ, nirodhajñānaṃ, mārgajñānaṃ, kṣayajñānam, anutpādajñānaṃ, yathābhūtajñānaṃ ca; evam eva savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir,
S06dsp1-2_u:10_5: avitarkāvicāraḥ samādhir, anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam, ājñendriyam, ājñātāvīndriyam, aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni, daśa kṛtsnāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa śūnyatā, daśa tathāgatabalāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ pratisaṃvido, mahāmaitrī, mahākaruṇā, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś ca;
S06dsp1-2_u:10_6: evam eva sarvajñatā, mārgākārajñatā, sarvākārajñatā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ, pañcābhijñāḥ, pañca cakṣūṃṣi, dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny,
S06dsp1-2_u:10_7: aśītir anuvyañjānāni ca. ete te sarvadharmā yeṣv anabhiniviṣṭā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
S06dsp1-2_u:11_0: tata āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:11_7: katamāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ, peyālaṃ yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni?
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_1_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_2_0: tatra katamāni dvādaśāyatanāni? ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāni, ṣaḍ bāhyāni. etāny ucyante dvādaśāyatanāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:14_0: tatra katamāni ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni? yaduta cakṣurāyatanaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:14_1: śrotrāyatanaṃ, ghrāṇāyatanaṃ, jihvāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, manaāyatanam. etāny ucyante ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:15_0: tatra katamāni ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni? yaduta rūpāyatanaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:15_1: śabdāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ, dharmāyatanam. etāny ucyante ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_3_0: tatra katama aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ? yaduta cakṣurdhātū,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_3_1: rūpadhātuś, cakṣurvījñānadhātuḥ; śrotradhātuḥ, śabdadhātuḥ, śrotravijñānadhātuḥ; ghrānadhātur, gandhadhātur, ghrāṇavijñānadhātuḥ; jihvādhātū, rasadhātur, jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ; kāyadhātuḥ, spraṣṭavyadhātuḥ, kāyavijñānadhātuḥ; manodhātur, dharmadhātur, manovijñānadhātuḥ. eta ucyanta aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_4_0: tatra katamāni catvāry āryasatyāni? yaduta duḥkham āryasatyaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_4_1: samudaya āryasatyaṃ, nirodha āryasatyaṃ, mārga āryasatyam. etāny ucyante catvāry āryasatyāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_5_0: tatra katamāni dvādaśa pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni? yadutāvidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_5_1: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, nāmarūpapratyayāni ṣaḍ āyatanāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_5_2: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavo, bhavapratyayā jātir, jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopayāsāḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_5_3: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati.
S06dsp1-2_u:19_10: evam asya kevalasya duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati.
S06dsp1-2_u:19_11: eṣa ucyate pratītyasamutpādo 'nulomaś ca pratilomaś ca.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_6_0: tatra katamāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? yaduta kāye kāyānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_7_0: tatra katamāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragrhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
S06dsp1-2_u:22_0: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
S06dsp1-2_u:23_0: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
S06dsp1-2_u:24_0: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃpramoṣāya bhūyobhāvanāyai paripūraṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_8_0: tatra katame catvāra ṛddhipādāh? yaduta chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādo,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_11_0: tatra katamāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni? yaduta smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_11_2: vīryasaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ, prītisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ, prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ, samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam, upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam. etāny ucyante sapta bodhyaṅgāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_14_0: tatra katamad animittaṃ vimokṣamukham? yaduta sarvadharmasvalakṣaṇatānimittapratyavekṣaṇacittasthitir animittavimokṣamukham.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_15_0: tatra katamad apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukham? yaduta sarvadharmānabhisaṃskāre 'nabhisaṃskāracittasthitir apraṇihitavimokṣamukham.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_16_0: tatra katamāni catvāri dhyānāni? yaduta viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati;
S06dsp1-2_u:34_0: sa vitarkavicārāṇām upaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvad avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati;
S06dsp1-2_u:35_0: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan,
S06dsp1-2_u:35_1: sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate smṛtimān sukhī sukhavihāry upekṣaka iti,
S06dsp1-2_u:36_0: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_17_0: tatra katamāni catvāry apramāṇāni? yaduta maitrī,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_17_1: karuṇā, muditā, upekṣā. etāny ucyante catvāry apramāṇāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_18_1: vijñānānantyāyatanam, ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam. etā ucyante catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_19_0: tatra katame 'ṣṭau vimokṣāḥ? yaduta rūpī rūpāṇi pasyaty, ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:40_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty, ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:41_0: śubham ity evādhimukto bhavaty, ayaṃ trtīyo vimokṣaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:42_0: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:43_0: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:44_0: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyātanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:45_0: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:46_0: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:48_0: viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ prathamā samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:49_0: sa vitarkavicārāṇām upaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ dvitīyā samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:50_0: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate smṛtimān sukhavihāry upekṣaka iti niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ tṛtīyā samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:51_0: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upeksāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ caturthī samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:52_0: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ pañcamī samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:53_0: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:54_0: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ saptamī samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:55_0: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyam aṣṭamī samāpattiḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:56_0: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ navamī samāpattiḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_21_0: tatra katamā nava saṃjñāḥ? yaduta vidhmātakasaṃjñā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_24_0: tatra katamad dharmajñānam? yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ parikarmitatve paricchedajñānam idam ucyate dharmajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_25_0: tatra katamad anvayajñānam? yac chakṣur anityam iti jñānam,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_25_1: evam eva śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, mano, rūpaṃ, śabdo, gandho, rasaḥ, spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmā anityā iti yaj jñānam idam ucyate 'nvayajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_26_0: tatra katamat paracittajñānam? yat parasattvānaṃ parapudgalānāṃ cetasaiva cetasi cetasikeṣu ca dharmeṣv avicikitsitaṃ jñānam idam ucyate paracittajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_27_0: tatra katamat saṃvṛtijñānam? yat pratipajjñānam idam ucyate saṃvṛtijñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_28_0: tatra katamad duḥkhajñānam? yad duḥkhasyotpādasthitijñānam idam ucyate duḥkhajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_29_0: tatra katamat samudayajñānam? yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam idam ucyate samudayajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_30_0: tatra kataman nirodhajñanam? yad duḥkhanirodhajñānam idam ucyate nirodhajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_31_0: tatra kataman mārgajñānam? yad āryāṣṭāṅgamārgajñānam idam ucyate mārgajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_32_0: tatra katamat kṣayajñānam? yad rāgadveṣamohakṣayajñānam idam ucyate kṣayajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_33_0: tatra katamad anutpādajñānam? yad bhavagatyanutpadajñānam idam ucyate 'nutpādajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_34_0: tatra katamad yathābhūtajñānam? yat tathāgatasya sarvajñatājñānam idam ucyate yathābhūtajñānam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_35_0: tatra katamad anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām anabhisamitānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_35_1: vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ, prajñendriyaṃ idam ucyate 'nājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_36_0: tatra katamad ājñendriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām abhisamitānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ vīryendriyaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_36_1: smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ, prajñendriyam idam ucyate ājñendriyam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_37_0: tatra katamad ājñātāvīndriyam? yad aśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ tadyathārhatāṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_37_3: vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyata ājñātāvīndriyam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_38_0: tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ? viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharaty ayam ucyate savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_39_0: tatra katamo vitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ? yā prathamadhyānasya dvitīyadhyānasya cāntarikāyam ucyate 'vitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_40_0: tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ? prathamaṃ dhyānam upādāya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir eṣa ucyate 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_41_0: tatra katamāny aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni? yadutādhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_41_1: tāni rūpāṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:78_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:78_1: tāni rūpaṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:79_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:79_1: tadyathomāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bāraṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam,
S06dsp1-2_u:79_2: evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhasānīdaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanam;
S06dsp1-2_u:80_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:80_1: tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇaṃ pītanidarśanaṃ pītanirbhāsam,
S06dsp1-2_u:80_2: evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsānīdaṃ caturtham abhibhvāyatanam;
S06dsp1-2_u:81_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:81_1: tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohitavarṇaṃ lohitanidarśanaṃ lohitanirbhāsam,
S06dsp1-2_u:81_2: evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsānīdaṃ pañcamam abhibhvāyatanam;
S06dsp1-2_u:82_0: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjnī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty avadātāny avadātavarṇāny avadātanidarśanāny avadātanirbhāsāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:82_2: evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty avadātāny avadātavarṇāny avadātanidarśanāny avadātanirbhāsānīdaṃ ṣaṣṭham abhibhvāyatanam;
S06dsp1-2_u:83_0: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānaṃ samatikramat pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīdaṃ saptamam abhibhvāyatanam;
S06dsp1-2_u:84_0: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam itī vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīdam aṣṭamam abhibhvāyatanam.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_42_0: tatra katamāni daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni? yaduta pṛthivīkṛtsnam,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_42_1: apkṛtsnaṃ, tejaḥkṛtsnaṃ, vāyukṛtsnam, ākāśakṛtsnaṃ, nīlakṛtsnaṃ, pītakṛtsnaṃ, lohitakṛtsnam, avadātakṛtsnaṃ, vijñānakṛtsnam. etāny ucyante daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni:
S06dsp1-2_u:86_0: sarvadhātūn pṛthivīdhātāv adhimucya sarvam api pṛthivīdhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:87_0: sarvadhātūn abdhātāv adhimucya sarvam apy abdhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:88_0: sarvadhātūṃs tejodhātāv adhimucya sarvam api tejodhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:89_0: sarvadhātūn vāyudhātāv adhimucya sarvam api vāyudhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:90_0: sarvadhātūn ākāśadhātāv adhimucya sarvam apy ākāśadhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:91_0: sarvadhātūn nīle dhimucya sarvam api nīlam eva bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:92_0: sarvadhātūn pīte 'dhimucya sarvam api pītam eva bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:93_0: sarvadhātūn lohite 'dhimucya sarvam api lohitam eva bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:94_0: sarvadhātūn avadāte 'dhimucya sarvam apy avadātam eva bhavati;
S06dsp1-2_u:95_0: sarvadhātūn vijñāne 'dhimucya sarvam api vijñānam evaikadhātur bhavati.
S06dsp1-2_u:96_0: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśanīlapītalohitāvadātavijñānaṃ sarvam apy ekam eva bhavatīty etāny ucyante kṛtsnāyatanāni.
S06dsp1-2_u:99_1: yaduta cakṣuḥ, śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, manaḥ. tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:99_3: evam eva śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, mano manasā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:100_0: tatra katamā bahirdhāśūnyatā? bāhyā dharmā ucyante yaduta rūpaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:100_1: śabdo, gandho, rasaḥ, spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmāḥ. tatra rūpāṇi rūpaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:100_3: evam eva śabdo, gandho, rasaḥ, spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:101_0: tatra katamādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā? adhyātmabāhyā dharmā ucyante ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:101_1: ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni. tatrādhyātmikā dharmā ādhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:101_3: bāhyā dharmā bāhyair dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:102_0: tatra katamā śūnyatāśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmaśūnyatā tayā sarvadharmaśūnyatayā sarvadharmaśūnyatā śūnyākūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:103_0: tatra katamā mahāśūnyatā? pūrvā dik pūrvayā diśā śūnyākūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:103_2: evam eva dakṣiṇā, paścimā, uttarā dik, catasro vidiśas, tā aṣṭau diśa, uparisṭāddig upariṣṭāddiśā śūnyā,
S06dsp1-2_u:104_0: tatra katamā paramārthaśūnyatā? paramārtha ucyate nirvāṇam.
S06dsp1-2_u:104_1: tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:105_0: tatra katamā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā? saṃskṛtam ucyate kāmadhātū,
S06dsp1-2_u:105_1: rūpadhātur, arūpadhātuḥ. tatra kāmadhātuḥ kāmadhātunā śūnyo 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya.
S06dsp1-2_u:106_0: tatra katamāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā? asaṃskṛtam ucyate yasya dharmasya notpādo,
S06dsp1-2_u:106_1: na sthitir, na nirodho, nānyathātvam. tatrāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:107_0: tatra katamātyantaśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:108_0: tatra katamānavarāgraśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya nāgatir upalabhyate 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:109_0: tatra katamānavakāraśūnyatā? yatra na kasyacid dharmasyāvakāro 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:110_0: tatra katamā prakṛtiśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ saṃskṛtānāṃ vāsaṃskṛtānāṃ vā sā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā,
S06dsp1-2_u:110_1: na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā, na bodhisattvaiḥ kṛtā, na buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ kṛtākūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:111_0: tatra katamā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā? tatra rūpyalakṣaṇaṃ rūpam,
S06dsp1-2_u:111_1: anubhavalakṣaṇā vedanā, saṃjānanalakṣaṇā saṃjñā, abhisaṃskāralakṣaṇāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
S06dsp1-2_u:111_2: vijānanalakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad yac ca saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svena svena lakṣaṇena śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:112_0: tatra katamā sarvadharmaśūnyatā? sarvadharmā ucyante pañca skandhā,
S06dsp1-2_u:112_1: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavo, rūpiṇo dharmā, arūpiṇo dharmāḥ, saṃskṛtā dharmā, asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ. tatra sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya;
S06dsp1-2_u:114_0: tatra katamābhāvaśūnyatā? yatra na kaścid bhāva upalabhyata iyam ucyate 'bhāvaśūnyatā.
S06dsp1-2_u:115_0: tatra katamā svabhāvaśūnyatā? yaḥ sāṃyogikasya svabhāvābhāva iyam ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatā.
S06dsp1-2_u:116_0: tatra katamābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā? nāsti sāṃyogikasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:117_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bhāvo bhāvena śūnyo,
S06dsp1-2_u:117_1: 'bhāvo 'bhāvena śūnyaḥ, svabhāvaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ, parabhāvaḥ parabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:118_0: tatra katamo bhāvaḥ? bhāva ucyate pañca skandhā yaduta rūpaṃ,
S06dsp1-2_u:120_0: kathaṃ svabhāvaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā sā na jñānena kṛtā na darśanena kṛtā na kenacit kṛtā.
S06dsp1-2_u:121_0: kathaṃ parabhāvaḥ parabhāvena śūnyaḥ? yotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā,
S06dsp1-2_u:121_2: bhūtakoṭir yaś cemeṣāṃ pareṇa śūnyaḥ parabhāvaḥ sa ucyate parabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:122_0: ete śāradvatīputra te sarvadharmā yeṣv anabhiniviṣṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gataḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.

S06dsp1-2_u:140_5: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā loke saha dharmeṇeti.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_46_0: tatra katamāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvid,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_46_1: dharmapratisaṃvin, niruktipratisaṃvit, pratibhānapratisaṃvit. etā ucyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_47_0: tatra katamā mahāmaitrī? yā tathāgatasya sarvasattveṣu śatrau ca mitre ca samavṛtiteyam ucyate mahāmaitrī.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_48_0: tatra katamā mahākarunā? niḥsattveṣu sattveṣu yo maitryatyāga iyam ucyate mahākaruṇā.
S06dsp1-2_u:145_0: nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ; nāsti ravitaṃ; nāsti muṣitasmṛtitā; nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā; nāsty asamāhitacittam; nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā; nāsti chandasya hānir; nāsti vīryasya hānir; nāsti smṛter hānir; nāsti samādher hānir; nāsti prajñāyā hānir; nāsti vimukter hānir nāsti vimuktijñānadarśanasya hāniḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_50_0: tatrā katamā sarvajñatā? yad dvādaśasu śrāvakapratyekabuddhāyataneṣv ekāntikaṃ pudgalanairātmyajñānam iyam ucyate sarvajñatā.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_51_0: tatra katamā mārgākārajñatā? yad bodhisattvasya triyānamārgajñasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāsaṃtuṣṭasya bodhisattvayānena niṣkramaṇam iyam ucyate mārgākārajñatā.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_52_0: tatra katamā sarvākārajñatā? yat tathāgatasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarveṣu traikālikākāreṣv avicikitsitaṃ jñānam iyam ucyate sarvākārajñatā.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_53_0: tatra katamaḥ ṣaṭ paramitāḥ? yaduta dānapāramitā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_55_0: tatra katamāni pañca cakṣūṃṣi? yaduta māṃsacakṣur,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_55_1: divyacakṣuḥ, prajñācakṣur, dharmacakṣur, buddhacakṣuḥ. imāny ucyante pañca cakṣūṃṣi.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_56_0: tatra katamāni tathāgatasya dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni? yaduta
S06dsp1-2_u:154_0: bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ. tatrāyaṃ supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ: sakalābhyāṃ pādatalābhyāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśati tadyathā karaṇḍatalaṃ samatalāvalambanāt susama ādhāre 'vasthāpitaṃ sakalenādhastalena bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśaty evam eva bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:155_0: bhagavān samantanemikaḥ. tatrāyaṃ samantanemikah: adhastāt pādatalayoś cakre jāte sahasrāre sanabhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrake;
S06dsp1-2_u:157_0: bhagavān dīrghāṅguliḥ. tatreyaṃ dīrghāṅgulitā: tasya hastapādāṅgulayo 'tidīrghā,
S06dsp1-2_u:158_0: bhagavān jalahastapādah: tasya hastapādayor jālāny avanaddhāni, yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
S06dsp1-2_u:160_0: bhagavān ucchaṅkhapādaḥ. tatreyam ucchaṅkhapādatā: āyatapārṣṇyā saṃprayoga āyatapārṣṇer gulphasya ca sandhir adṛśyatvena saṃyujyate,
S06dsp1-2_u:161_0: bhagavān aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ. tatrāyam aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ: tasya jaṅghe anupūrvatanuke bhūtvā samyag anupūrve bhavataḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:162_2: bhagavān sthitako 'navanatakāya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇitalābhyāṃ jānumaṇḍale parispṛśati saṃmṛśati;
S06dsp1-2_u:163_1: tadyathā varagotra ājāneyo mahāhasty ājāneyo vāśvaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:164_2: tasyaikaikaromakūpebhya ekaikāni romāṇi jātāni nīlāni kuṇḍalāvartāni snigdhakomalāni;
S06dsp1-2_u:165_0: bhagavān ūrdhvāgraromaḥ. tatreyam ūrdhvāgraromatā: tasya śiraḥkāye keśaromāṇi jātāny ūrdhvam ākuñcitāni nīlāni kuṇḍalāvartāni pradakṣiṇāvartāni;
S06dsp1-2_u:167_0: bhagavān suvarṇavarṇaḥ. tadyathā nānāratnakhacito jāmbunadasuvarṇayūpa evaṃ surūpaḥ sudarśanas,
S06dsp1-2_u:168_0: bhagavān saptotsadaḥ. tatreyaṃ saptotsadatā: tasya dvayoḥ padayor dvāv utsadau surūpau sudarśanau parivṛddhamāṃsalohitau;
S06dsp1-2_u:168_1: evam eva dvayor hastayor dvāv utsadau surūpau sudarśanau parivṛddhamāṃsalohitau,
S06dsp1-2_u:168_2: dvayor aṃsayor dvāv utsadau, kandharopari caika utsadaḥ surūpaḥ sudarśanaḥ parivṛddhamāṃsalohitaḥ;
S06dsp1-2_u:177_0: bhagavān rasāgravān. sa ṛjukaṇṭhanāḍiko 'jihmam asaṅgaṃ gilanasamartho 'sti;
S06dsp1-2_u:178_1: mukhāj jihvāṃ nirṇamayyobhe nāsikāvivare ubhe cakṣurvivare ubhe karṇavivare spṛśati parimṛśati,
S06dsp1-2_u:185_0: bhagavato bhruvor antara ūrṇā jātā karpāsavat komalā kundapuṣpacandraśaṅkhapadmakesaragokṣīrāvaśyāyapuṣpasadṛśā;
S06dsp1-2_u:192_1: samapāṇilatā, avyavahitapāṇilekhā, āyatapāṇilekhā, vyapagatamaladurgandhagātrā, bhāsvaravarṇāś, cārvāyatanamukhāś, candrasadṛśamukhāḥ, pūrvābhilāpino, 'pagatabhrūkuṭimukhāḥ; sarvaromakūpebhyo manāpo gandho nirgacchati;
S06dsp1-2_u:192_2: sugandhamukhā bhavanti, siṃhavikrāntagāmino, nāgavikrāntagāmino, haṃsavikrāntagāminaś, chattrākārottamāṅgā, madhurasarvākāraparisamāptaghoṣās,
S06dsp1-2_u:194_1: śubhasandhayaś, citasandhayaḥ, pariśuddhapāṇipādā, vyāmaprabhāḥ, prabhāsvaragāminaḥ, kāyadarśanatṛptadevamanuṣyāḥ,
S06dsp1-2_u:194_2: sarvaprāṇyavimānitadarśanāḥ, sattvānuśāsakās; teṣāṃ vāg anukūlavartiparṣado bahir na nirgacchati;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_0: tata āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_1: saced bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmeṣv anabhiniviṣṭās,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_2: tena bodhisattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthaṅ na samanupaśyanti yaduteme dharmāḥ kuśalā ime dharmā akuśalā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_3: ime dharmā vyākṛtā ime dharmā avyākṛtā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_4: ime dharmā laukikā ime dharmā lokottarā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_5: ime dharmāḥ sāsravā ime dharmā anāsravā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_6: ime dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā ime dharmā asaṃskṛtā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_58_7: ime dharmāḥ sādhāraṇā ime dharmā asādhāraṇā ity,
S06dsp1-2_u:197_0: evam ukte bhagavān ayuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat:
S06dsp1-2_u:197_1: yad api śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyanti tat saṃvṛtitaḥ,
S06dsp1-2_u:198_0: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan saṃvṛtitaḥ sat paramārthato nāsti?
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_59_0: bhagavān avocat: yasmin kāle śāradvatīputra bodhisattva evaṃ cintayati:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_59_1: tatra katame kuśalā laukikā dharmā iti,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_59_2: sa evaṃ cintayati: ete kuśalā laukikā dharmā yaduta pitṛjñatā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_59_3: mātṛjñatā, śramaṇyatā, brāhmaṇyatā, kulajyeṣṭhāpacāyitā, dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu, bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_60_0: tatra katame 'kuśalā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_61_0: tatra katame 'vyākṛtā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_61_2: avyākṛtāni vākkarmāṇy, avyākṛtāni manaḥkarmāṇy, avyākṛtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_62_0: tatra katame lokottarā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati:
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_62_1: ete lokottarā dharmā yaduta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_62_2: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgas, trīṇi vimokṣamukhāny, anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam, ājñendriyam, ājñātāvīndriyaṃ, savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_62_5: tathāgatasya daśa balāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ pratisaṃvido, mahāmaitrī, mahākaruṇā, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā iti.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_63_0: tatra katame sāsravā dharmāḥ? traidhatukaparyāpannāḥ pañca skandhā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_63_1: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvari dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattaya ete ucyante sāsravā dharmāḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_64_0: tatra katame 'nāsravā dharmāḥ? catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni peyālaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā ete 'nāsravā dharmāḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_65_0: tatra katame saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ? yaduta kāmadhātū,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_65_1: rūpadhātur, arūpadhātur, evam eva pañca skandhāś, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś, catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni peyālaṃ yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_66_0: tatra katame 'saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ? yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ notpādo,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_66_1: na sthitir, na nirodho, nānyathātvam, evam eva rāgakṣayo, dveṣakṣayo, mohakṣaya, evam eva dharmasthitir, dharmatā, dharmadhātur, dharmānavadyatā, tathatābhrāntatathatānanyatathatā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_67_0: tatra katame sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ? yaduta catvāri dhyānāni,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_67_1: catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, pañcābhijñā, ete pṛthagjanaiḥ saha sādhāraṇā dharmaḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_68_0: tatra katame pṛthagjanaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇā dharmāḥ? saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣikā dharmā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_68_1: daśa balāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ pratisaṃvidas, trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eta ucyante 'sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ.
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_0: yad api śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ sarvadharmān evaṃ pṛthak paśyamānāḥ paramārthato nābhiniviśanti,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_1: katham anabhiniviṣṭāḥ? tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo māyānirmitāṃ caturaṅginīṃ senāṃ dṛṣṭvā,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_4: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_5: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo gharmārto nānāvidhāṃ marīcikām ūrmivac calantīṃ dṛṣṭvedaṃ jalam iti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_6: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_7: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣaḥ svapne nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā vibuddhaḥ san teṣām rūpam astīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_8: evam eva śaradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_9: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa udake candraṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra candro 'stīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_10: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_11: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa indrajālaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra vastutve nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_12: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastutve nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_13: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit pūruṣo māyayākāśe carann api tatrākāśo 'stīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_14: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_15: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣaḥ pratiśrutkāṃ śrutvā tatra śabdo 'stīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_16: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_17: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo gandharvanagaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra nagaram astīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_18: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti;
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_19: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa ādarśe mukhapratibimbaṃ dṛṣṭvaitan mukham astīti nābhiniviśaty,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_20: evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti,
S06dsp1-2_u:dsp_69_21: dharmeṣv anabhiniviṣṭāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
